name: Seedsong
description:
Seedsong is a relaxing, musical, physics-based puzzle game prototype.

The flowers blooming in this cave release musical seeds that sing when they collide. Can you make them sing the required melody?

I worked together with Kate Killick for this project. We wanted to create a puzzle game where music was the goal, and not a byproduct. This is what we came up with. Kate focused on the art and some level design while I focused on the development. We hope you enjoy this small collaboration project! You can find more of Kate's games on https://katekillick.itch.io/
